quote: Perhaps it was a passing moment of madness after all. There is no trace of it any more. My odd feelings of the other week seem to me quite ridiculous today: I can no longer enter into them.
quote_letters: PERHAPS IT WAS A PASSING MOMENT OF MADNESS AFTER ALL THERE IS NO TRACE OF IT ANY MORE MY ODD FEELINGS OF THE OTHER WEEK SEEM TO ME QUITE RIDICULOUS TODAY I CAN NO LONGER ENTER INTO THEM
